targets.query: SELECT sum("local.packetLoss")/sum("totalPackets") FROM "rtpprocessor.voice" WHERE $timeFilter AND "trunkOrTenant" =~ /BYOC [Nn][Ee][Ww][Gg][Oo].*/ AND "totalPackets" > 0 and type = 'trunk' GROUP BY trunkOrTenant,  time($interval) fill(null)
